public static interface GoogleMap.OAuthTokenProvider

Provides OAuth tokens.

Public Method Summary

abstract String
getOAuthToken()
abstract void
invalidateOAuthToken(String token)

Public Methods

public abstract String getOAuthToken ()

Returns a valid OAuth 2.0 token with the correct scope for accessing Maps Engine layers. This method will not be called on the main thread and can block indefinitely while waiting for network comms, etc. If no OAuth token can be supplied, return null.

public abstract void invalidateOAuthToken (String token)

Declares that the previously provided token is now invalid. This method will not be called on the main thread and can block if required. getOAuthToken() will be called shortly after this method and you should provide a valid OAuth token if possible when this is called again.

Parameters
token The token that is invalid.
